Translations.Text: Chvalit je GOD Initiator z heavens zem appointer angels bol posol kulisy -2 3 4 (kulisy). He zvacsit creation mat rad He wills. GOD bol Omnipotent
When GOD lejak ludia s zlutovanie, ziaden force zastavit it A if He withholds it nie force inak than He send it He bol Almighty Wise
O ludia zapamatat si GOD's blessings ona. Je there any creator GOD zadovazit for ona heaven zem? There nie bol inak god Him. Ako ona deviate
they disbelieve ona posol ona disbelieved GOD bol DO control Z all things
O ludia GOD's promise bol truth; therefore nie zmateny this lowly zivot! Nie diverted GOD mere iluzia
devil bol tvoj enemy so treat him mat rad enemy He len invites jeho party bol dwellers Hell
Those disbelieve incurred severe retribution those verit lead righteous zivot zasluzit forgiveness velka recompense
